channel.title: 525 compile.bat help
channel.description:
[code]@echo off echo Compiling rs2hd/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin\javac.exe" -d bin -cp deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j13-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar -sourcepath src src/com/rs2hd/*.java echo rs2hd/*.java complete Pause[/code]
Ok, so that's the code in my compiler. The file "compile.bat" is in the main section of the source. When I move it into a file called "cmd" and open the file it says.
[code]Compiling rs2hd/*.java javac: file not found: src\com\rs2hd\*.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options rs2hd/*.java complete Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

item.title: 525 compile.bat help
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

post all batch file related issues/questions in the sticky.

item.title: 525 compile.bat help

item.description:
@Bob13524 wrote:

@echo off echo Compiling rs2hd/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin\javac.exe" -d bin -cp deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j13-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar -sourcepath src src/com/rs2hd/*.java echo rs2hd/*.java complete Pause

Ok, so that’s the code in my compiler. The file “compile.bat” is in the main section of the source. When I move it into a file called “cmd” and open the file it says.

Compiling rs2hd/*.java javac: file not found: src\com\rs2hd\*.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options rs2hd/*.java complete Press any key to continue . . .
